solution_line_template: It takes {rob_travel_time_hours} hour * {mark_time_multiplier} = <<{rob_travel_time_hours}*{mark_time_multiplier}={mark_travel_time_hours}>>{mark_travel_time_hours} hours for Mark to get to the national park.

The extra time it takes Mark to get to the national park is {mark_travel_time_hours} hours - {rob_travel_time_hours} hour = <<{mark_travel_time_hours}-{rob_travel_time_hours}={extra_time_mark_takes_hours}>>{extra_time_mark_takes_hours} hours
Mark should leave his home at {rob_departure_hour} a.m. - {extra_time_mark_takes_hours} hours = <<{rob_departure_hour}-{extra_time_mark_takes_hours}={mark_departure_hour}>>{mark_departure_hour} a.m.
